description.en:
1: Every Sweet Night   
Garyou's childhood friend Kou is a famous model who never has time for him anymore. So Garyou hooks up with random guys to try to ignore his feelings for Kou. But the latest one may be more than he can handle.  
  
2: The Return Road  
After his parents moved overseas to further their careers, he had to live with his uncle. Their relationship has always been contentious, so will things turn out well?  
  
3: I Want To Drive You Crazy  
Tsutsumi has an angel's face and a devil's mind. The high-schooler is always thinking up new ways to tease his pet: the school's doctor!  
  
4: His Training Failure  
A middle aged video store owner is enthralled by his younger lover Tetsu. But is Tetsu as serious about him?  
  
5: Love At First Sight  
An unpopular model is finding it hard to get gigs and has finally decided to model for an SM painter because of the double rate the job provides.   
  
6: Sweet Youth  
A gay high school student is at the end of his wits; he can't come out, he doesn't know how to find a partner, much less experience love and sex.   
  
7: Beautiful Life  
His cute cousin has just lost his parents. Looking at his crying face, he can't help but want to comfort him.  
  
8-9: The Reason To Torment  
He can't quite put what he is feeling for his classmate into shape: does he hate him or is it more that just that? Why does he want to bully him so?
